messages.title: Fighting for The Whittington
messages.content: Labour Government is trying to close the A&E department and the maternity ward at the Whittington Hospital. David Schmitz and the local Liberal Democrats have been actively involved in the battle to save the Whittington A&E.

messages.title: Defending our local community
messages.content: Concerns about many betting shops in Tottenham, the local Labour MP's role as a minister in the Government's department responsible for the recent explosion of gambling dens on our high streets. David Schmitz and the Liberal Democrats' actions, including opposing these developments and attempting to introduce more local control over such establishments.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for local schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats secured an extra £2.5 billion into our schools to give every child the best start in life. The local Lib Dems helped the Hornsey schools and the Lib Dems have a plan for pupils in Haringey.
Liberal Democrats are highlighting issues with unfair flight tax on families. They oppose the current system that charges unfair taxes on flights and have proposed changes to address the issue.

issues.education: The local Lib Dems helped the Hornsey schools and the Lib Dems have a plan for pupils in Haringey.
issues.governance: David Schmitz and the Liberal Democrats' actions, including opposing these developments and attempting to introduce more local control over such establishments.
issues.health: Labour Government is trying to close the A&E department and the maternity ward at the Whittington Hospital.

housing.content: Concerns about the explosion of gambling dens on our high streets, and Labour's role in it.

quotes.text: "The wonderful David Schmitz" - Tottenham's Labour MP 'flies to CO2 summit' Charles Taylor

images.caption: "It is the Labour Government that is forcing a Labour council... to close A&E." David Schmitz, Lib Dem candidate in Hornsey.
The local Lib Dems "led the fight to keep the A&E at the Whittington." Haringey Independent.
